item.title: ‘Lost in the Jungle’ Review: ‘Free Solo’ Directors Capably Tackle a Remarkable Tale of Survival in the Amazon for Nat Geo
item.description: Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi, Jimmy Chin and Juan Camilo Cruz tell the story of the Mucutuy siblings and the dueling rescue missions to save their lives in 2023.
